text: hey sarah, would love to see that. all execs and all directors have a lunch meeting though, that is a ton of people missing the opportunity to join ;( - any chance to push that ?
uups, sorry - is that today?
same thing though, unless we can move our directors meeting ...
Oh no! I had no idea! I think that's a question for ally. I think she might have already ordered lunch...
we have already ordered lunch for today. Lunch n Learn will continue as planned today :slightly_smiling_face:
Can we record it?
actually another good point: is there a way for our remote folks to join?
we've done sort of ineffective laptop with google hangout in the past, would love if we could do something a little better
<@U0HS41J3Y> do you have thoughts on this?
<@U167FL70V> i just added a video link to the social calendar event! if people want to join remote through there
could someone rig a iphone/camera up on a tripod to record and then we can just share post presentation?
bc i can’t join in real time :white_frowning_face:
oh nice thank you <@U1172PRDX>!
unless you can replay that video link.
<@U2DRLHLRF> i'll try to rig up my iphone to record
:sob: :heartbeat: <@U1172PRDX>
If the presentation is done with Keynote, it’s possible to record the slideshow presentation with audio and then export as a video
whatever we do we should also use the same thing for all hands next week
a quicktime recording might also work for screen recording + audio on the presentation, if the presentation isn't in Keynote
thx badass babes for all this great info/solve!
<@U0XJFPSRL> ahh crap salad... it's on google slides
I hope crap salad isn't what was ordered for lunch
we dont eat crap in this dimension
<!channel> to those to can join for the lunch and learn we'll be kicking this thing off in a couple minutes!
for anyone who is remote or can't join us in social space, here is the gchat link! <https://hangouts.google.com/hangouts/_/uncorkedstudios.com/teamcal>

attachments.title: Join this live Google Hangouts video call
attachments.text: Click to join now. If the call is over, invite your friends to a new one or start a chat with text, photos and emoji.

text: lots of left overs from stella taco! please help yourself!
Thanks Sarah, that was great!
That was great, especially about ambiguity and engineers. I’m only speaking for myself, but I feel the balance between ambiguity and intended function is part of the art in engineering
That was SO GOOD thanks Sarah!
Yes, thanks so much for sharing, Sarah! sounds like it was an amazing conference. Being more comfortable with ambiguity is also a personal goal of mine so it’s nice to hear that i’m in good company.
Super interesting, thanks for sharing with us!
thanks everyone! i'm so glad i could share even a bit of the info i learned! i'll be sending out an email with the supporting info and my conference notes shortly!
If anyone has seen a notebook with a llama printed on the cover I will give you a high five
damn, I want that high five
yas, felix gave me one
Dammit Felix.
